content.description:
Possum iam scribere tibi, quantum in publicapublicus, -a, -um, adj.: public provinciae 
BaeticaeBaetica, -ae, f.: Baetica (a Roman province in modern Spain) causa laboris fecerim.
content.question: In the sentence, scribere is translated

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
